The average distance between the warehouse and delivery points is 15 miles, and each truck can cover 5 miles per gallon of fuel. Calculate the total fuel consumption for all deliveries, assuming that each truck makes only one trip per day and carries its maximum load. Provide step-by-step reasoning.
